item.title: March 22nd, 2018 --- Quote of the Week: -------------- "If you allow people to make more withdrawals than deposits in your life, then you will be out of balance and at a negative! Know when to close the account. Remember, you have to take care of yourself first in order to help someone else."
Updates: Check out the new, helpful videos that are available in the Tutorials section of your box. There will be more to come. Call or text us at (440) 703-0093 with any questions or issues.
